mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.member_name, m.member_type FROM board4 b INNER JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_type = '수강생';
SELECT b.*, m.member_name, m.member_type FROM board4 b INNER JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_type = '관리자' OR m.member_type='강사님';
SELECT board4_no, board4_title, board4_content, board4_regdate, board4_isshow, member_id FROM board4 WHERE board4_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board4_no DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT b.board4_no, b.board4_title, b.board4_content, b.board4_regdate, b.board4_isshow, b.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_type FROM board4 AS b JOIN member AS m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE board4_no=#{board4_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board4(board4_title, board4_content, board4_regdate, board4_isshow, member_id) values(#{board4_title},#{board4_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id})
